title: Migration
description: Epic for the migration phase of the project.

title: Onboarding
description: Setup of the migration items and prerequisities. This includes any accounts, access, and ASR components.

title: Migration tooling kick-off
description: Kick off to discuss strategy and validate workloads, groupings, and timeline.

title: Schedule migration tooling session
description: Schedule a session to review the clients environment, welcome kit details if available, and design an ASR topology that will meet the migration goals.

title: Create and share ASR design
description: Create and share ASR topology with the customer. If this can be completed in advance of the tooling session, it should be so that it can be reviewed.

title: Schedule working sessions to deploy ASR components
description: Schedule working sessions to deploy ASR Azure and on-prem components to the design.

title: Accounts and Access
description: Establish and verify required accounts and access needed to configure the migration components.

title: Establish and verify Azure sccess
description: Establish access to the customer environment and Azure sub(s). Document the access methods here.

title: Establish and verify on-prem access
description: Verify necessary on-prem accounts and permissions are setup to perform the migration. CMC will need on-prem accounts, VPN, read access to vCenter, Hyper-V, or SCVMM, and admin rights to ASR or Az Migrate appliances that have been deployed.

title: Document service accounts and service principals
description: Verify proper service accounts are established and documented in the key vault.

title: Azure Environment Setup
description: Azure environment setup

title: Create Automation Accounts
description: Create automation account that will be used for failover runbooks.

title: Copy workbooks to Automation Accounts
description: Copy our standard post-migration runbooks to the new automation accounts.

title: Create ASR Storage Cache Accounts
description: Create storage account for the ASR cache.

title: Create ASR Recovery Services Vaults
description: Create a Recovery Services Vault in each target region.

title: Configure ASR Recovery Services Vaults
description: Configure new or existing ASR RSVs. Configure logging, alerts, perform initial infrastructure setup, register any configuration servers.

title: Create or verify failover testing environment
description: Create VNETs for failover testing, or if an existing environment exists, verify that it is configured correctly and isolated.

title: Create and attach NSGs to failover testing subnets
description: Create and attach an NSG to isolate the failover testing subnets.

title: On-Prem Tooling Setup
description: User story for any prerequisites tasks.

title: Provision servers for the ASR Deployment Planner
description: Have the customer deploy a server to land the ASR Deployment planner.

title: Configure ASR Deployment Planner
description: Work with the customer to configure the ASR Deployment planner and start collecting data.

title: Provision Azure Migrate appliance
description: Have the customer IT team download and deploy the Azure Migrate appliance. Schedule working session to complete the configuration and registration.

title: Configure Azure Migrate appliance
description: Work with the customer in a working session to configure and register the Azure Migrate appliance.

title: Seek advance change approvals
description: Get necessary change requests submitted and approved for deployment work.

title: Deploy ASR configuration server or appliance
description: Work with the customer to deploy the ASR appliance. We will need one appliance for each vCenter server.

title: Workload Migration: Group 1
description: Workload Migration Group 1 Work Items

title: Workload Migration: Group 2
description: Workload Migration Group 2 Work Items

title: Workload Migration: Group 3
description: Workload Migration Group 3 Work Items
